author: CBR
description:
In this Heroes Journey Podcast clip, Tim Blake Nelson reveals how the Marvel Cinematic Universe inspired him to dive into the world of superheroes in his novel, Superhero. 

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 10.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/fmCZcnr8ymw
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg
